Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

CXL.description: The port metrics specific to CXL ports.
CXL.longDescription: This type shall contain the port metrics specific to CXL ports.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BackpressureAveragePercentage.description: The average congestion of the port as a percentage.
BackpressureAveragePercentage.longDescription: This property shall contain CXL Specification-defined 'Backpressure Average Percentage' as a percentage.

FibreChannel.description: The Fibre Channel-specific port metrics for network ports.
FibreChannel.longDescription: This type shall describe Fibre Channel-specific metrics for network ports.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CorrectableFECErrors.description: The total number of correctable forward error correction (FEC) errors.
CorrectableFECErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of times this port has received traffic with correctable forward error correction (FEC) errors.

InvalidCRCs.description: The total number of invalid cyclic redundancy checks (CRCs).
InvalidCRCs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of invalid cyclic redundancy checks (CRCs) observed on this port.

InvalidTXWords.description: The total number of invalid transmission words.
InvalidTXWords.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of times this port has received invalid transmission words.

LinkFailures.description: The total number of link failures.
LinkFailures.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of link failures observed on this port.

LossesOfSignal.description: The total number of losses of signal.
LossesOfSignal.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of times this port has lost signal.

LossesOfSync.description: The total number of losses of sync.
LossesOfSync.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of times this port has lost sync.

RXBBCreditZero.description: The number of times the receive buffer-to-buffer credit count transitioned to zero.
RXBBCreditZero.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of times the receive buffer-to-buffer credit count transitioned to zero since last counter reset.

RXExchanges.description: The total number of Fibre Channel exchanges received.
RXExchanges.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Fibre Channel exchanges received.

RXSequences.description: The total number of Fibre Channel sequences received.
RXSequences.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Fibre Channel sequences received.

TXBBCreditZero.description: The number of times the transmit buffer-to-buffer credit count transitioned to zero.
TXBBCreditZero.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of times the transmit buffer-to-buffer credit count transitioned to zero since last counter reset.

TXBBCreditZeroDurationMilliseconds.description: The total amount of time the port has been blocked from transmitting due to lack of buffer credits.
TXBBCreditZeroDurationMilliseconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the total amount of time in milliseconds the port has been blocked from transmitting due to lack of buffer credits since the last counter reset.

TXBBCredits.description: The number of transmit buffer-to-buffer credits the port is configured to use.
TXBBCredits.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of transmit buffer-to-buffer credits the port is configured to use.

TXExchanges.description: The total number of Fibre Channel exchanges transmitted.
TXExchanges.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Fibre Channel exchanges transmitted.

TXSequences.description: The total number of Fibre Channel sequences transmitted.
TXSequences.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Fibre Channel sequences transmitted.

UncorrectableFECErrors.description: The total number of uncorrectable forward error correction (FEC) errors.
UncorrectableFECErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of times this port has received traffic with uncorrectable forward error correction (FEC) errors.

GenZ.description: The port metrics for a Gen-Z interface.
GenZ.longDescription: This type shall describe the Gen-Z related port metrics.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AccessKeyViolations.description: The total number of Access Key Violations detected.
AccessKeyViolations.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Access Key Violations detected for packets received or transmitted on this interface.

EndToEndCRCErrors.description: The total number of ECRC transient errors detected.
EndToEndCRCErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain total number of ECRC transient errors detected in received link-local and end-to-end packets.

LLRRecovery.description: The total number of times Link-Level Reliability (LLR) recovery has been initiated.
LLRRecovery.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of times Link-level Reliability (LLR) recovery has been initiated by this interface.  This is not to be confused with the number of packets retransmitted due to initiating LLR recovery.

LinkNTE.description: The total number of link-local non-transient errors detected.
LinkNTE.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of link-local non-transient errors detected on this interface.

MarkedECN.description: The number of packets with the Congestion ECN bit set.
MarkedECN.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of packets that the component set the Congestion ECN bit prior to transmission through this interface.

NonCRCTransientErrors.description: The total number transient errors detected that are unrelated to CRC validation.
NonCRCTransientErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of transient errors detected that are unrelated to CRC validation, which covers link-local and end-to-end packets, such as malformed Link Idle packets or PLA signal errors.

PacketCRCErrors.description: The total number of PCRC transient errors detected.
PacketCRCErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of PCRC transient errors detected in received link-local and end-to-end packets.

PacketDeadlineDiscards.description: The number of packets discarded due to the Congestion Deadline sub-field reaching zero.
PacketDeadlineDiscards.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of packets discarded by this interface due to the Congestion Deadline sub-field reaching zero prior to packet transmission.

RXStompedECRC.description: The total number of packets received with a stomped ECRC field.
RXStompedECRC.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of packets that this interface received with a stomped ECRC field.

ReceivedECN.description: The number of packets received on this interface with the Congestion ECN bit set.
ReceivedECN.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of packets received on this interface with the Congestion ECN bit set.

TXStompedECRC.description: The total number of packets that this interface stomped the ECRC field.
TXStompedECRC.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of packets that this interfaced stomped the ECRC field.

Networking.description: The port metrics for network ports, including Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and InfiniBand, that are not specific to one of these protocols.
Networking.longDescription: This type shall describe the metrics for network ports, including Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and InfiniBand, that are not specific to one of these protocols.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RDMAProtectionErrors.description: The total number of RDMA protection errors.
RDMAProtectionErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA protection errors.

RDMAProtocolErrors.description: The total number of RDMA protocol errors.
RDMAProtocolErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA protocol errors.

RDMARXBytes.description: The total number of RDMA bytes received on a port since reset.
RDMARXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA bytes received on a port since reset.

RDMARXRequests.description: The total number of RDMA requests received on a port since reset.
RDMARXRequests.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA requests received on a port since reset.

RDMATXBytes.description: The total number of RDMA bytes transmitted on a port since reset.
RDMATXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA bytes transmitted on a port since reset.

RDMATXReadRequests.description: The total number of RDMA read requests transmitted on a port since reset.
RDMATXReadRequests.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA read requests transmitted on a port since reset.

RDMATXRequests.description: The total number of RDMA requests transmitted on a port since reset.
RDMATXRequests.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA requests transmitted on a port since reset.

RDMATXSendRequests.description: The total number of RDMA send requests transmitted on a port since reset.
RDMATXSendRequests.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA send requests transmitted on a port since reset.

RDMATXWriteRequests.description: The total number of RDMA write requests transmitted on a port since reset.
RDMATXWriteRequests.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of RDMA write requests transmitted on a port since reset.

RXBroadcastFrames.description: The total number of valid broadcast frames received on a port since reset.
RXBroadcastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of valid broadcast frames received on a port since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic.

RXDiscards.description: The total number of frames discarded in a port's receive path since reset.
RXDiscards.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames discarded in a port's receive path since reset.

RXFCSErrors.description: The total number of frames received with frame check sequence (FCS) errors on a port since reset.
RXFCSErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames received with frame check sequence (FCS) errors on a port since reset.

RXFalseCarrierErrors.description: The total number of false carrier errors received from phy on a port since reset.
RXFalseCarrierErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of false carrier errors received from phy on a port since reset.

RXFrameAlignmentErrors.description: The total number of frames received with alignment errors on a port since reset.
RXFrameAlignmentErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames received with alignment errors on a port since reset.

RXFrames.description: The total number of frames received on a port since reset.
RXFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames received on a port since reset.

RXMulticastFrames.description: The total number of valid multicast frames received on a port since reset.
RXMulticastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of valid multicast frames received on a port since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic.

RXOversizeFrames.description: The total number of frames that exceed the maximum frame size.
RXOversizeFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames that exceed the maximum frame size.

RXPFCFrames.description: The total number of priority flow control (PFC) frames received on a port since reset.
RXPFCFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of priority flow control (PFC) frames received on a port since reset.

RXPauseXOFFFrames.description: The total number of flow control frames from the network to pause transmission.
RXPauseXOFFFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of flow control frames from the network to pause transmission.

RXPauseXONFrames.description: The total number of flow control frames from the network to resume transmission.
RXPauseXONFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of flow control frames from the network to resume transmission.

RXUndersizeFrames.description: The total number of frames that are smaller than the minimum frame size of 64 bytes.
RXUndersizeFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames that are smaller than the minimum frame size of 64 bytes.

RXUnicastFrames.description: The total number of valid unicast frames received on a port since reset.
RXUnicastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of valid unicast frames received on a port since reset.

TXBroadcastFrames.description: The total number of good broadcast frames transmitted on a port since reset.
TXBroadcastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good broadcast frames transmitted on a port since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic.

TXDiscards.description: The total number of frames discarded in a port's transmit path since reset.
TXDiscards.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames discarded in a port's transmit path since reset.

TXExcessiveCollisions.description: The number of times a single transmitted frame encountered more than 15 collisions.
TXExcessiveCollisions.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of times a single transmitted frame encountered more than 15 collisions.

TXFrames.description: The total number of frames transmitted on a port since reset.
TXFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames transmitted on a port since reset.

TXLateCollisions.description: The total number of collisions that occurred after one slot time as defined by IEEE 802.3.
TXLateCollisions.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of collisions that occurred after one slot time as defined by IEEE 802.3.

TXMulticastFrames.description: The total number of good multicast frames transmitted on a port since reset.
TXMulticastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good multicast frames transmitted on a port since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic.

TXMultipleCollisions.description: The times that a transmitted frame encountered 2-15 collisions.
TXMultipleCollisions.longDescription: This property shall contain the times that a transmitted frame encountered 2-15 collisions.

TXPFCFrames.description: The total number of priority flow control (PFC) frames sent on a port since reset.
TXPFCFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of priority flow control (PFC) frames sent on a port since reset.

TXPauseXOFFFrames.description: The total number of XOFF frames transmitted to the network.
TXPauseXOFFFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of XOFF frames transmitted to the network.

TXPauseXONFrames.description: The total number of XON frames transmitted to the network.
TXPauseXONFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of XON frames transmitted to the network.

TXSingleCollisions.description: The times that a successfully transmitted frame encountered a single collision.
TXSingleCollisions.longDescription: This property shall contain the times that a successfully transmitted frame encountered a single collision.

TXUnicastFrames.description: The total number of good unicast frames transmitted on a port since reset.
TXUnicastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good unicast frames transmitted on a port since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PortMetrics.description: The PortMetrics schema contains usage and health statistics for a switch device or component port summary.
PortMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall represent the port metrics for a switch device or component port summary in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

CXL.description: The port metrics specific to CXL ports.
CXL.longDescription: This property shall contain the port metrics specific to CXL ports.

FibreChannel.description: The Fibre Channel-specific port metrics for network ports.
FibreChannel.longDescription: This property shall contain Fibre Channel-specific port metrics for network ports.

GenZ.description: The port metrics specific to Gen-Z ports.
GenZ.longDescription: This property shall contain the port metrics specific to Gen-Z ports.

Networking.description: The port metrics for network ports, including Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and InfiniBand, that are not specific to one of these protocols.
Networking.longDescription: This property shall contain port metrics for network ports, including Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and InfiniBand, that are not specific to one of these protocols.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeErrors.description: The PCIe errors associated with this port.
PCIeErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCIe errors associated with this port.

RXBytes.description: The total number of bytes received on a port since reset.
RXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of bytes received on a port since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic, and inclusive of all protocol overhead.

RXErrors.description: The total number of received errors on a port since reset.
RXErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of received errors on a port since reset.

SAS.description: The physical (phy) metrics for Serial Attached SCSI (SAS).  Each member represents a single phy.
SAS.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of physical related metrics for Serial Attached SCSI (SAS).  Each member in the array shall represent a single phy.

TXBytes.description: The total number of bytes transmitted on a port since reset.
TXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of bytes transmitted on a port since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic, and inclusive of all protocol overhead.

TXErrors.description: The total number of transmission errors on a port since reset.
TXErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of transmission errors on a port since reset.

Transceivers.description: The metrics for the transceivers in this port.  Each member represents a single transceiver.
Transceivers.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of transceiver related metrics for this port.  Each member in the array shall represent a single transceiver.

SAS.description: The physical metrics for Serial Attached SCSI (SAS).
SAS.longDescription: This type shall describe physical (phy) related metrics for Serial Attached SCSI (SAS).

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

InvalidDwordCount.description: The number of invalid dwords that have been received by the phy outside of phy reset sequences.
InvalidDwordCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of invalid dwords that have been received by the phy outside of phy reset sequences.

LossOfDwordSynchronizationCount.description: The number of times the phy has restarted the link reset sequence because it lost dword synchronization.
LossOfDwordSynchronizationCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of times the phy has restarted the link reset sequence because it lost dword synchronization.

RunningDisparityErrorCount.description: The number of dwords containing running disparity errors that have been received by the phy outside of phy reset sequences.
RunningDisparityErrorCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of dwords containing running disparity errors that have been received by the phy outside of phy reset sequences.

Transceiver.longDescription: This type shall describe the transceiver related metrics.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RXInputPowerMilliWatts.description: The RX input power value of a small form-factor pluggable (SFP) transceiver.
RXInputPowerMilliWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the RX input power value of a small form-factor pluggable (SFP) transceiver.

SupplyVoltage.description: The supply voltage of a small form-factor pluggable (SFP) transceiver.
SupplyVoltage.longDescription: This property shall contain the supply voltage of a small form-factor pluggable (SFP) transceiver.

TXBiasCurrentMilliAmps.description: The TX bias current value of a small form-factor pluggable (SFP) transceiver.
TXBiasCurrentMilliAmps.longDescription: This property shall contain the TX bias current value of a small form-factor pluggable (SFP) transceiver.

TXOutputPowerMilliWatts.description: The TX output power value of a small form-factor pluggable (SFP) transceiver.
TXOutputPowerMilliWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the TX output power value of a small form-factor pluggable (SFP) transceiver.

title: #PortMetrics.v1_4_0.PortMetrics
